languages.text: "Если ты хочешь их истребить, элантах, не трать время на выслеживание их. Дай им уничтожить себя самим — помани призом, оружием или трофеем, за которую можно поспорить. Когда мон-кай закончат резать друг друга за право обладать ей — твои воины закончат дело. Эта тактика очень хорошо показывает себя против вашей расы".

"If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. Instead, deceive them into destroying each other. Tempt them with a prize, a weapon, or a trophy that they can fight over. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors will finish the deed. This tactic often proves effective against your kind."
languages.original_text: "Если ты хочешь их истребить, элантах, не трать время на выслеживание их. Дай им уничтожить себя самим — помани призом, оружием или трофеем, за которую можно поспорить. Когда мон-кай закончат резать друг друга за право обладать ей — твои воины закончат дело. Эта тактика очень хорошо показывает себя против вашей расы".

traits.locale_text: "If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. Instead, lure them into defeating each other with a prize, a weapon or a trophy that they can fight for. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors shall finish the deed. This tactic proves itself to be very useful against your kind."

After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors shall finish the deed. This tactic proves itself to be very useful against your kind."

"If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. Instead, deceive them into destroying each other. Tempt them with a prize, a weapon, or a trophy that they can fight over. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors will finish the deed. This tactic often proves effective against your kind."

languages.text: “如果你打算彻底消灭他们，外界人，就不要浪费时间去追捕他们。相反，用他们渴望的财富、武器与战利品，挑起他们内讧。等到那些猴子为了争夺利益，自相残杀结束之后，你的战士就可以对他们给予致命一击。这种策略的可行性经过无数事实验证，对你们的种族而言非常有效。”
languages.original_text: "If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. Instead, deceive them into defeating each other with a prize, a weapon or a trophy that they can fight for. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors shall finish the deed. This tactic proves itself to be very useful against your kind."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算彻底消灭他们，外界人，就不要浪费时间去追捕他们。相反，用他们渴望的财富、武器与战利品，挑起他们得内讧。等到那些猴子为了争夺利益，自相残杀结束之后，你的战士就可以对他们给予致命一击。这种策略的可行性经过无数事实验证，对你们的种族而言非常有效。”

languages.text: «Si quiere exterminarlos, elantach, no pierda el tiempo dándoles caza. En lugar de eso, engáñelos para que se enfrenten entre sí con un premio, un arma o un trofeo por el que puedan luchar. Cuando los mon-keigh hayan terminado de despedazarse unos a otros por el derecho a obtenerlo, sus guerreros terminarán la gesta. Esta táctica ha demostrado ser muy útil contra los de su especie».
languages.original_text: "If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. Instead, deceive them into defeating each other with a prize, a weapon or a trophy that they can fight for. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors shall finish the deed. This tactic proves itself to be very useful against your kind."

traits.locale_text: «Si quiere exterminarlos, elantach, no pierda el tiempo dándoles caza. En lugar de eso, engáñelos para que se enfrenten entre sí con un premio, un arma o un trofeo por el que puedan luchar. Cuando los mon-keigh hayan terminado de despedazarse unos a otros por el derecho a obtenerlo, sus guerreros terminarán la gesta. Esta táctica ha demostrado ser muy útil contra los de su especie».

languages.text: 「星外人よ、奴らを絶滅させたいのであれば、狩りで時間を無駄にしてはならない。その代わりに、賞金や武器、戦利品で奴らを欺き、互いに戦わせるのが得策だ。それを手に入れるためにモン＝ケイが互いを傷つけ合った後、今度はあなたの戦士がその行為を終わらせるのだ。この手法は、あなたの種族に対しては非常に効果的であることが証明されているぞ」
languages.original_text: "If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. Instead, deceive them into defeating each other with a prize, a weapon or a trophy that they can fight for. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors shall finish the deed. This tactic proves itself to be very useful against your kind."

traits.locale_text: 「星外人よ、奴らを絶滅させたいのであれば、狩りで時間を無駄にしてはならない。その代わりに、賞金や武器、戦利品で奴らを欺き、互いに戦わせるのが得策だ。それを手に入れるためにモン＝ケイが互いを傷つけ合った後、今度はあなたの戦士がその行為を終わらせるのだ。この手法は、あなたの種族に対しては非常に効果的であることが証明されているぞ」

languages.text: « Si vous comptez les exterminer, elantach, ne perdez pas de temps à les pourchasser, manipulez-les pour qu'ils se battent entre eux pour un objet quelconque, une arme ou un trophée et, quand ils auront fini de s'entretuer, vos guerriers pourront achever les survivants. C'est une tactique qui a largement fait ses preuves contre les vôtres. »
languages.original_text: "If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. Instead, deceive them into defeating each other with a prize, a weapon or a trophy that they can fight for. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors shall finish the deed. This tactic proves itself to be very useful against your kind."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous comptez les exterminer, elantach, ne perdez pas de temps à les pourchasser, manipulez-les pour qu'ils se battent entre eux pour un objet quelconque, une arme ou un trophée et, quand ils auront fini de s'entretuer, vos guerriers pourront achever les survivants. C'est une tactique qui a largement fait ses preuves contre les vôtres. »

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr sie auslöschen möchtet, Elantach, dann vergeudet Eure Zeit nicht damit, sie zu jagen. Bringt sie lieber durch eine List dazu, sich gegenseitig zu besiegen. Gebt ihnen einen Preis um den sie sich streiten können, eine Waffe oder Trophäe. Wenn die Chem-Pan-Sey sich deswegen gegenseitig die Köpfe eingeschlagen haben, können Eure Krieger die übrigen erledigen. Diese Taktik ist gegen Euer Volk immer wieder sehr effektiv."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to exterminate them, elantach, do not waste your time on hunting them down. After the mon-keigh are finished slicing each other up for the right to obtain it, your warriors shall finish the deed. This tactic proves itself to be very useful against your kind."
